body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Keith Hayes and I'm with Grand Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Keith. My name is Rachel Griffin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. Could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I was born on the twenty-fifth of November, nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. And may I also have your current phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is six seven eight- five five five- six one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because of the poor food quality during my stay at the hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. We appreciate your feedback and will address this issue. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Rachel. Have a great day.
